flawed_nl_solution:
If all 3 stoplights are red, the first route will take 10 + 3*3 = <<10+3*3=91>>91 minutes.
Thus, the first route will take 91-14 = <<91-14=77>>77 minutes longer than the second route.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 91. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
